amendment.description: To authorize the acceptance of guarantees with gifts for the development of the Marine Corps Heritage Center at Marine Corps Base, Quantico, Virginia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 811 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 811 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6897; text: CR S6897) To authorize the acceptance of guarantees with gifts for the development of the Marine Corps Heritage Center at Marine Corps Base, Quantico, Virginia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 811 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 811 proposed by Senator Warner.
